name: Heartless Powerplant
description: Don't you want to know what it feels like to live without a heart?  I'm joking - you will die without a heart.  However, you can have a powerplant in your body that generates an electromagnetic field, give you massive energy for without having to charge!

name: Pump Jump
description: Who said you can jump high only on a trampoline?  Get that high jump with Hulk's Pump Jump!

name: Super Size Me
description: Have you ever wished, 'I wish I could skip this traffic and get to the city in one step.'?  You literally can with Ant-Man's Super Size Me.  You can even change your size so small that you can sneak into restricted areas.

name: Wall Climb
description: Do you want the coolest photo on your instagram?  What about you walking vertically on the side of the Empire State Building?  Spider-Man's Wall Climbing is all you need to get those likes you want!

name: Catch Me If You Can
description: You got speed?  Well, think again.  Nothing is faster than Quicksilver.
